Title: SQL Injection in Login Form
Description: User input directly concatenated into SQL query allows authentication bypass
Remediation: Use parameterized queries with prepared statements

Title: Remote Code Execution via File Upload
Description: Uploaded files executed as server-side code due to missing extension validation
Remediation: Implement strict file type validation and store uploads outside webroot

Title: Stored XSS in User Profile
Description: Profile bio field allows HTML/JS injection affecting all profile viewers
Remediation: HTML encode all user input before rendering

Title: Weak Password Requirements
Description: Passwords only require 6 characters with no complexity requirements
Remediation: Enforce minimum 12 characters with complexity requirements

Title: Missing HTTPS on Login Page
Description: Credentials transmitted over unencrypted HTTP connection
Remediation: Implement HTTPS site-wide with HSTS headers

Title: Session Fixation
Description: Session ID not regenerated after authentication
Remediation: Generate new session ID upon successful login

Title: Open Redirect
Description: Unvalidated redirect URL allows phishing attacks

Title: Information Disclosure in Headers
Description: Server version exposed in X-Powered-By header
Remediation: Remove or obscure server version headers
